pages.title: Spirit Portal
pages.text: The Spirit Portal can only be created in the $(l:dimensions/spirit_world)Spirit world$(/l). It can be used by witches to $(l:dimensions/spirit_world#manifestation)Manifest$(/l) in the $(item)Overworld$() for a short time.$(br)Traversing the Spirit Portal won't bring any items over, with rare exceptions such as $(l:)Icy Needles$(/l).
